comments.body: This has no effect for permanent view, and please let me know if this is not desirable. I can introduce `isTempView` for each suite and only apply this if the suite is for a local or global temp view.
it's ok to have a little waste in the test.

actually no, because we can't get the viewName before calling `createView`. for example, after creating a global temp view, the viewName will be global_temp.testView.
with this method, we can use `withView` for temp, global, permanent view test.
